docs.text: Welcome to Wu Getting started Prerequisites In order to install the Wu compiler, you first need to have Rust/Cargo installed on your system. curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh Install Rust. Installation cargo install wu Install the Wu compiler.
docs.title: Welcome to Wu

docs.text: In order to install the Wu compiler, you first need to have Rust/Cargo installed on your system. curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh Install Rust.
docs.title: Prerequisites

docs.text: cargo install wu Install the Wu compiler.
docs.title: Installation
